articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Catch up on this week’s biggest crypto and NFT gaming news and find some weekend reads in our latest roundup.
articles.title: This Week in Crypto Games: Pixels Token Launch, N64 on Bitcoin, Portal Breaks Record

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: UPDATED: Thanks to Ordinals, you can find working video games and emulated consoles inscribed on the Bitcoin blockchain. Here’s how to play them.
articles.title: You Can Play Super Nintendo, N64, and Other Classic Games on Bitcoin—Here’s How

articles.description: Miguel Faus, director of NFT-funded feature film "Calladita," joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the film's recent premiere and how the "radically independent" decentralized Film3 movement is evolving.
articles.title: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus: How Web3 Filmmaking is 'Taking the Castle'

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Nakamoto wrote that calling Bitcoin an investment was “dangerous” and said touting its anonymity was “shady.”
articles.title: Satoshi Lore Grows as More Bitcoin Inventor Emails Emerge

articles.description: Pudgy Penguins CEO Luca Netz and Unstoppable Domains COO Sandy Carter joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the launch of the NFT collection's .pudgy domains, its second line of toys at Walmat, and the upcoming launch of the Pudgy World game.
articles.title: Pudgy Penguins Teams Up With Unstoppable Domains

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Ethereum and Uniswap stole the show this week. AI tokens also exploded.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Ethereum Steals the Show, Bitcoin Loses Steam, and AI Tokens Explode

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Federal prosecutors called the criminal fine and financial penalty "the largest enforcement action" in the agency's history.
articles.title: Binance Must Pay $4.3 Billion In Federal Case as CZ Awaits Sentencing

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Bitcoin is in a different place than it was four years ago, the last time the cryptocurrency underwent a halving. Here’s what you need to know.
articles.title: Bitcoin Halving and BTC Price: Will This Time Be Different?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The popular web browser now allows BAT transfers to self-custody Solana wallets—and the team hasn't ruled out other blockchain integrations.
articles.title: You Can Now Move Brave Browser Rewards On-Chain With a Solana Wallet

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum may be near a small correction just days after posting big gains in intra-day and intra-week sessions.
articles.title: AI Tokens Resist Cooling Crypto Market as Bitcoin, Ethereum Wobble

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: The 'Four Dragons' collection from digital fashion collective SYKY celebrates the Chinese Year of the Dragon.
articles.title: Designer Stephy Fung: 'Taking a Stand' For Digital Fashion With New SYKY Collection

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Experts warn that miners should get "ready to shut down unprofitable machines" after the Bitcoin halving cuts rewards.
articles.title: 'No Guarantee' Bitcoin Halving Will Be Favorable for Miners: Riot Platforms

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Binance reports record-breaking demand for the Portal staking pools ahead of the cross-chain gaming token's listing next week.
articles.title: Portal Fever: Record $8.6 Billion Staked for Binance Rewards Ahead of Game Token Airdrop

articles.description: Improbable's Rob Whitehead joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse technology firm's collaborations with blue-chip NFT collections, and how adding tens of thousands of players to a game will work in practice.
articles.title: Improbable Chief Product Officer: Web3 Games Need to Put Experience, Game Logic Onchain

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Decentralized exchange Uniswap may soon have an upgrade to reward holders of governance tokens. The price of UNI has surged as a result.
articles.title: Uniswap Price Skyrockets After Foundation Proposes Long-Awaited Staking Rewards

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Ronin (RON) is gradually rebounding after Axie Infinity co-founder Jeff Zirlin’s wallets were hacked, while XAI jumped to a new peak.
articles.title: Xai Gaming Token Hits All-Time High, Ronin Still Recovering After Founder’s Wallets Drained

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The suspected “esoteric bug” has not helped AVAX performance, which is down for the fifth day in a row this week.
articles.title: AVAX Dips as Avalanche Network Faces Block Production Halt

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: I can "live with it one way or the other," he told Fox News during an interview this week.
articles.title: Trump Softens His Bitcoin Stance: 'A Lot of People Are Doing It'

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: An L1 consensus failure might create a day of panic for devs, but "with an L2 bug, people could permanently lose lots of money." he said.
articles.title: Vitalik Buterin Wary of Pushing Too Much Complexity to Ethereum L2s

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Today’s $3 billion expiry is nothing compared to the open interest accumulating for March expiry—right before the Bitcoin halving.
articles.title: $3 Billion in Bitcoin Options Expire Today—Here’s Why It Matters

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: "Rip, shear, mow, and tear." Husqvarna and id Software are teaming up to release a version of Doom that plays on Wi-Fi lawn mowers in April.
articles.title: Can Robot Lawn Mowers Run ‘Doom’? Yes Indeed

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Jeff “Jiho” Zirlin tweeted that his personal wallets on the Ronin chain were compromised as funds were taken and sent to Tornado Cash.
articles.title: ‘Axie Infinity’ Founder’s Ronin Wallets Hacked for $9.5 Million in Ethereum

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The value of the AI company's shares held by FTX has doubled since the last time a sale was contemplated.
articles.title: FTX Can Now Sell Its $1B Stake in Anthropic to Repay Creditors

articles.author: Ryan Kawailani Ozawa
articles.description: The crypto exchange says Gary Gensler's agency is trying to “commandeer expansive new authority over the U.S. economy.”
articles.title: Kraken Decries ‘Expansive New Theory’ Behind SEC Lawsuit, Calls for Dismissal

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Jack Dorsey-led payment provider notched a 90% year-over-year increase in Bitcoin gross profit, driving its stock up in after-hours trading.
articles.title: Block Says Its Bitcoin Bets, Boosted By the Cash App, Yielded $207M In Gains

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The company that wants to scan your eyeballs for some cash is flying high, along with other projects connected with artificial intelligence.
articles.title: Worldcoin, Nvidia Hit Record Highs as AI Hype Fuels Crypto and Stock Market Rally

articles.author: Reza Jafery
articles.description: First-person shooter Nemesis Downfall is PancakeSwap's third game, offering ND token rewards on BNB Chain in its upcoming open beta.
articles.title: PancakeSwap Launching 'Nemesis Downfall' Shooter With Crypto Rewards

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The social news platform deepens its relationship with the search giant, trading access to its vast trove of user-generated content for greater visibility.
articles.title: Reddit Signs Deal with Google for AI Model Training

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: A coalition of crypto giants including Coinbase and Andreessen Horowitz filed suit against the SEC in Texas, seeking regulatory clarity.
articles.title: Coinbase, a16z Take SEC to Court Over 'Unlawful' Crypto Overreach

articles.author: Ryan Kawailani Ozawa
articles.description: A Twitter hoax is sparking some panic and some schadenfreude over Google's mixed record on services.
articles.title: No, Google Is Not Shutting Down Gmail

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: StarkWare announced Thursday that it will gradually allocate Starknet tokens to contributors and investors following backlash.
articles.title: Starknet Price Jumps After Ethereum Scaler Bows to Pressure Over Token Unlock Schedule

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Notcoin players have mined trillions of virtual coins by tapping in Telegram. Co-creator Sasha Plotvinov explains what comes next.
articles.title: ‘We're Promising Nothing’: Telegram Game Notcoin Has 25 Million Players and a Soon-to-be-Real Token

articles.description: Notcoin, a simple clicker-style game within messaging app Telegram, has racked up over 25 million players since the start of 2024 and plans to convert the trillions of virtual coins mined so far into a real crypto token on The Open Network. Open Builders founder Sasha Plotvinov joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to explain the viral phenomenon.
articles.title: What Is Notcoin? Co-Creator Sasha Plotvinov Explains the Viral Telegram Game and Token

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Social media site Reddit wants to go public, an SEC filing shows. It also reveals that the company has Bitcoin and Ethereum.
articles.title: Reddit Files to Go Public, Says It Invested in Bitcoin and Ethereum

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The latest open-source model from Stability AI excels at prompt adherence and can understand natural language instead of keywords and tags.
articles.title: Stable Diffusion 3 Is Here—And the AI Image Generator Blows Away MidJourney, Dall-E 3 and Google ImageFX

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Fresh Satoshi Nakamoto lore emerges as cypherpunk Adam Back shares 2008-2009 emails with the Bitcoin inventor.
articles.title: Bitcoin Inventor Satoshi Nakamoto Emails Revealed in Court

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Nigerian authorities are reportedly blocking citizens' access to popular crypto trading platforms.
articles.title: Coinbase Says It's Still Accessible in Nigeria Despite Reported Crypto Ban

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Citing Ethereum's technical configuration and market capitalization, Coinbase believes the SEC should approve an ETH spot ETF.
articles.title: Coinbase Backs Grayscale's Ethereum ETF: 'Virtually Identical' to Bitcoin ETFs

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Proof of Play’s Multichain network will power fully on-chain games, starting with Pirate Nation, but will open up to other developers.
articles.title: 'Pirate Nation' Studio Reveals Network for Fully On-Chain Games on Arbitrum

articles.description: Ahead of the PIXEL token launch, Pixels game founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the hectic last few months—and why the game migrated between Ethereum scaling networks, from Polygon to Ronin.
articles.title: 'Pixels' Founder Luke Barwikowski on the Game's Wild Rise and Ronin Move

articles.description: Offchain Labs co-founder and CEO Steven Goldfeder joined Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to discuss the ApeCoin DAO's vote to create an Ethereum layer-2 gaming network on Arbitrum for the Bored Ape Yacht Club ecosystem.
articles.title: How Arbitrum Won the 'ApeChain' Vote for an ApeCoin Ethereum Scaler

articles.description:
Reza is joined by Sam Simmons, founder of MintPass. 


They discuss:
- The Parallels between Professional Poker and Crypto
- The profitability of Ethics
- The "Recommend-To-Earn" economy
articles.title: Recommend-To-Earn: Tokenizing Travel Recommendations with Sam Simmons

articles.description: The Collected's Rachel Wilkins joins digital artist Grant Riven Yun to explore his remarkable journey blending art with medical studies, to achieve over $2 million in sales.
articles.title: The Collected: Grant Riven Yun's Journey Through Art and Medicine

articles.description: Nifty Island co-founder Charles Smith joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the game's play-to-airdrop campaign, why token incentives are so important to getting crypto games off the ground, and how the team plans to sustain its growth going forward.
articles.title: Nifty Island Co-Founder on Why Play-to-Airdrop Is the Game's 'Booster Rocket'

articles.description: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains the popular Ronin farming game Pixels and details around the upcoming PIXEL token airdrop.
articles.title: Pixels: The Hot Crypto Game and Airdrop Explained in One Minute or Less

articles.description: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains Ethereum layer-2 scaling network Blast, from the creators of top NFT marketplace Blur, including its upcoming airdrop and how to participate.
articles.title: Ethereum Scaler Blast Explained in One Minute or Less

articles.description: Luke Barwikowski, founder of farming game Pixels on Ronin, joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the incoming launch of the PIXEL token and why he sees it as such a turning point for the rising blockchain game.
articles.title: Pixels Founder: Why PIXEL Token Launch Feels Like 'Day One' for Ronin Game

articles.description: Yat Siu, CEO and co-founder of Animoca Brands, joins the FOMO Hour to discuss his view of the Web3 gaming space, how 2024 is already shaping up to be a big year for crypto gaming, the importance of education in the Web3 space, and much, much more.
articles.title: Animoca’s Yat Siu: How Crypto Gaming Gains Mass Adoption

articles.description: Gameplay footage from the STX1 early access gameplay demo of Shrapnel, a first-person shooter built on Avalanche.
articles.title: Shrapnel STX1 Early Access Gameplay

articles.description: Rug Radio creator Benjamin White digs into the rise of Farcaster, the decentralized social media platform that's challenging Twitter following the launch of its Frames feature. Is this the decentralized social media app that finally clicks with the masses?
articles.title: Farcaster: Has Decentralized Social Media Finally Arrived?

articles.description: Pseudonymous NFT collector and entrepreneur Gmoney joined Rug Radio's live "FOMO Hour" show to discuss why he took out a $1 million loan on one of the most recognizable CryptoPunks NFTs around.
articles.title: Why Gmoney Took Out a $1 Million Loan on a CryptoPunks NFT

articles.description: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains the latest sensation taking over timelines on Crypto Twitter, Solana Hunger Games. The new "crypto AR" game from GG.zip is backed by Delphi and plans to launch in the spring. Here's what going on, explained in one minute or less.
articles.title: Solana Hunger Games: Explained in One Minute or Less

articles.description:
Tribute Brand founder and CEO Gala Marija Vrbanic joins 5 Questions With SCENE to discuss not just fashion, but graffiti crimes, fishless aquariums, and the apparently emergent sport of wind chasing.

Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.
articles.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Gala Marija Vrbanic

articles.description: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains why the crypto world can't stop talking about Solana's Jupiter. What is JUP? Who qualified for the airdrop? And will there be another round?
articles.title: Why Is Everyone Talking About Jupiter on Solana?

articles.description: Meow, the pseudonymous founder of Solana DEX aggregator Jupiter, made a surprise appearance today on Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to address the JUP airdrop "FUD,"  and explain why he believes the backlash to the team's launch liquidity pool is unfounded.
articles.title: Jupiter Founder Meow Unloads on the Solana Airdrop 'FUD'
